tests.claim_text: Only 5% of workers can effectively verify AI output
tests.hypothesis: Less than or equal to 5% of workers can effectively verify AI output
tests.null_hypothesis: More than 5% of workers can effectively verify AI output
data_needed: Studies on AI tool usage effectiveness
tests.success_criteria: Find studies showing actual percentage of effective AI users

data_points.summary: Study shows 15% of office workers can effectively use AI tools for verification

tests.claim_text: AI + verifier is 100x cheaper than human labor
tests.hypothesis: AI + verification costs < 1% of human labor costs
tests.null_hypothesis: AI + verification costs >= 1% of human labor costs
tests.success_criteria: Calculate actual cost ratios with hidden costs included

tests.claim_text: No new job categories will emerge fast enough
tests.hypothesis: New AI-related jobs < displaced jobs in same period
tests.success_criteria: Compare job creation vs destruction rates 2020-2024

tests.hypothesis: Physical job capacity < displaced cognitive workers
tests.null_hypothesis: Physical jobs can absorb significant displaced workers
tests.success_criteria: Calculate absorption capacity vs displacement volume

tests.claim_text: AI capabilities will continue improving exponentially
tests.hypothesis: AI performance metrics show exponential growth
tests.null_hypothesis: AI performance shows linear or plateauing growth
tests.success_criteria: Identify trend in AI capability metrics 2020-2024
